welcome.title: Login with your Amazon credential
welcome.text: Please check if the domain is correct and then press the Log-in button. You will be redirected to your Amazon login page.
welcome.warning: To log in you must be connected to the same Wi-Fi network as Homey Pro.

playback.timeout: Playback error (Timeout). Try restarting playback from your Echo.
playback.generic: Playback error. If the error persists try reconnecting the device.

volume.timeout: Volume error (Timeout). Try changing volume from your Echo.
volume.generic: Volume error. If the error persists try reconnecting the device.

error.generic: Error: if the error persists try reconnecting the device.
error.authenticationIssues: Authentication issues: to fix try repairing your device.
